item.title: Building Worklog: a PERN stack web application
item.description: Introduction I’ll be building a simple web application to log workers’ activity. I’ll be using PostgresSQL for database, React for front end and Express for routing the app. Functionality For user: Log work time, location, job details Calculate pay/wage automatically For admin: See all current working users See all jobs done by time/category/location etc. Automate the boring stuff Setting up the environment I’m running Arch Linux, so this part will be Linux specific.
